conversations.body_text: Hi Harold PM,    You can use this link for logistics tracking, the parcel has arrived in the US, UPS hasn't picked it up yet and will be coming over to pick it up today and there will be a logistics update tomorrow. The explanation from the logistics provider is that the US has had a lot of customs checks and riots recently, which will have an impact on the timeframe.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=1ZB3681B0336423948
